column4: i'm a linux noob and i hope this is an easy solution, but I'm trying to get my 8gb SD card to read using a USB sd read/writer and it will not work... It does however recognize a 2gb SD Card I have
is there a size limit for SD cards in Ubuntu?
it works in windows vista, now windows xp
>2GB means it is an SDHC card. your reader needs to support that format
